subject: How do people actually run your relaxation methods?
body:
Hi Jiawang,

I've been thinking about how many optimization methods get published but never really make it out of the paperâ€”someone reads it, likes the approach, but can't quite reconstruct the implementation details.

We're building Ouro to help with that. It's basically a thin API layer that lets researchers package their computational methods so others can actually use them without reinventing everything.

Would you be open to a quick chat in January about whether this might be useful for your work?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
